{{Description|"Daintily her toes touch the water's face, and the light that ripples forth equals even the seven heavens."}}
'''Dance of Haftkarsvar''' is [[Nilou]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|cooldown|immediate}}
* {{TalentNote|particles|Skill DMG|1.5}}
* {{TalentNote|particles|Sword Dance, Whirling Steps, Luminous Illusion, or Water Wheel during the Pirouette state|1}}
* The state Nilou enters with her third dance step in the Pirouette state is unaffected by her first two dance steps.
* Tranquility Aura will apply {{Wet}} in a 2.5m radius every '''0.5''' seconds. Due to its [[Internal Cooldown]], it can only apply Wet to the same target once every 2 seconds.
* While under the Pirouette or Lunar Prayer effects, Nilou's [[Interruption Resistance]] is increased. If a Sword Dance or Water Wheel attack is used under these states, Interruption Resistance will be increased even further.
* While under the Pirouette or Lunar Prayer effects, Nilou's Normal Attack string will not be reset.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|ascension|1|Court of Dancing Petals|character=Nilou|talent=Dance of Haftkarsvar|affects Dance of Haftkarsvar as follows:}}
** When all characters in the party are all {{Color|Dendro}} or {{Color|Hydro}}, and there are at least one Dendro character and one Hydro character:<br />The completion of the third dance step of Nilou's Dance of Haftkarsvar will grant all nearby characters the Golden Chalice's Bounty for 30s.<br />Characters under the effect of Golden Chalice's Bounty will increase the [[Elemental Mastery]] of all nearby characters by 100 for 10s whenever they are hit by {{Color|Dendro attacks}}. Also, triggering the [[Bloom]] reaction will create Bountiful Cores instead of Dendro Cores.<br />Such Cores will burst very quickly after being created, and they have larger AoEs.<br />Bountiful Cores cannot trigger [[Hyperbloom]] or [[Burgeon]], and they share an upper numerical limit with Dendro Cores. Bountiful Core DMG is considered DMG dealt by Dendro Cores produced by Bloom.<br />Should the party not meet the conditions for this Passive Talent, any existing Golden Chalice's Bounty effects will be canceled.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Dance of the Waning Moon|Increases Luminous Illusion DMG by 65%, and extends the Tranquility Aura's duration by 6s.}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Fricative Pulse}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|5|Twirling Light}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Haftkarsvar likely refers to the seven {{w|karshvar}} mentioned in the {{w|Avesta}}, deriving from Persian {{Lang|mini=1|fa=هفت کارشور|fa_rm=haft kâršvar|fa_tl=seven karshvar.}}
** The name for Haftkarsvar in Chinese and a few other localizations directly translate to "seven regions" or "seven realms."
